post:
[Cloud Shards](http://www.cloudshards.com) LET storage/backup plans. No coupons required. Only 1 type of plan @ the best prices. We're offering the best prices for the best features.

These are hardware RAID60 nodes with Gigabit ports.

Location: Los Angeles
Data Center: WebNX

Storage 100GB $4.25USD/month - [ORDER NOW](https://www.cloudshards.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=34)
- 1 CPU @ 50%
- 128MB RAM / 96MB VSwap
- 100GB RAID60 HDD
- 300GB Traffic @ 100mbit Port
- 1 IPv4 Address

Storage 200GB $7.00USD/month - [ORDER NOW](https://www.cloudshards.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=35) (thanks @Maounique for the tip)
- 1 CPU @ 50%
- 128MB RAM / 96MB VSwap
- 200GB RAID60 HDD
- 600GB Traffic @ 100mbit Port
- 1 IPv4 Address

Quarterly Payment - 2.5% OFF
Semi-Annual Payment - 5% OFF
Annual Payment - 10% OFF

Other plans are available [here](https://www.cloudshards.com/cart.php?gid=11). We're also happy to discuss custom storage requirements. Send me a PM or contact us.

IPv6 is not available at this time. Create a ticket on this if you absolutely need it for a backup plan. TUN/TAP ready. Australian customers need to pay 10% GST.

No IRC, no torrents. Strictly storage/backup.

Common templates on order. SolusVM has more templates if required.

Instant setup. We accept PayPal.

We offer a 7 day refund policy. No questions asked.

Looking Glass / Test IP/ Test Download - http://ca.lg.cloudshards.net/ (Thanks @Telephone)
